field.name: bDriving
field.desc: Torque is spreaded between the driving wheels

field.name: fViscosityFriction
field.desc: Extra tire friction factor when sliding (positive increase handling; negative is realistic)

field.name: fBrakingTorque
field.desc: The maximum torque the wheel can apply when braking

field.name: bHandBrake
field.desc: if > 0, wheel is connected to thandbrake control

field.name: fSuspStrength
field.desc: The strength [N/m] of the suspension at each wheel

field.name: fSuspDampingCompression
field.desc: The damping force [N/(m/sec)] of the suspension at each wheel

field.name: fSuspDampingRelaxation
field.desc: The damping force [N/(m/sec)] of the suspension at each wheel
